name: @tobes31415/dispose
description: Dispose objects using the decorator pattern

scripts.test: npm run build:compile:quick && npm run test:jest
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run build:compile:full && npm run build:copy && npm run uglify && npm run flowgen && npm run apidocs
scripts.apidocs: npm run apidocs:clean && npm run apidocs:typedoc && npm run apidocs:copy && npm run apidocs:tidy
scripts.apidocs:copy: cpx docs_bin/modules/_dispose_.md docs && mv docs/_dispose_.md docs/dispose.md
scripts.apidocs:tidy: line-replace docs/dispose.md:1 '' && line-replace docs/dispose.md:3 '' && replace '_dispose_' 'dispose' docs/dispose.md

author: Jake Tober
